original_title: Inter-School Rugby: St. Joseph's in big win over Kingswood, St. Anthony's edge Wesley
original_body_lines: St. Joseph's romped to a comfortable 48 points to 15 win over Kingswood College in their Under 29 Inter-School Rugby League match.
St. Joseph's ran in eight tries, half of which were converted, having sealed the bonus point by half time.
Kingswood scored two tries, of which one was converted, also putting over a penalty.
St. Anthony's College meanwhile pipped Wesley College for a 30 points to 29 win in their match.

The Antonians led 13-10 at half-time, and held onto that advatange, scoring three converted tries and three penalities in total, while Wesley College scored four tries, converting three, and a penalty. (Pix: Kushan Pathiraja)
